item.title: Inserting One Billion Rows in SQLite Under A Minute
item.description: This is a chronicle of my experiment where I set out to insert 1B rows in SQLite

item.title: I ended up adding duplicate records on a unique index in MongoDB
item.description: how my curiosity lead me to discover a weird inconsistency with MongoDB where I was able to insert records that conflicted the index constraints
